programme.title: MegaDrama: Jiwa Yang Kau Puja Ep04

programme.title: MegaDrama: Jiwa Yang Kau Puja Ep05
programme.desc: Umar jadi teruja apabila dia sukarela untuk membantu penyiasatan tentang kematian Akash. Adri tidak setuju bila Julia beritahu yang dia akan berkahwin dengan Jamal kerana Adri tidak percaya Jamal.

programme.title: MegaDrama: Jiwa Yang Kau Puja Ep06
programme.desc: Haziq menakutkan Firhani apabila dia masuk pindah ke Hotel tempat Firhani tinggal. Firhani cuba menipu yang dia tidak lagi tinggal disitu tetapi Haziq tidak termakan dengan kata-kata Firhani.

programme.title: Finale Hero Remaja 2021 Ep08

programme.desc: Frank and Erin are at odds when Frank learns the D.A.'s office keeps a list of NYPD cops they consider unreliable. Also, Danny and Baez recruit retired mobster Vincent Rella to assist in an investigation.

programme.title: Alex Rider S1 Ep07
programme.desc: Alex leads a Special Forces squad back inside Point Blanc in a stealth mission to rescue his friends and stop Greif's plans.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior Junior S1 Ep17
programme.desc: All-star ninjas Drew Drechsel and Barclay Stockett mentor 16 9- and 10-year-old semifinalists as the tournament is narrowed to the final four.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex S2 Ep01
programme.desc: Charlie and Rex pull apart the secrets of a local band when their lead singer is found dead on the beach.

programme.title: Magic: Caught on Camera S1 Ep07
programme.desc: The Magic Crasher pranks unsuspecting strangers in Los Angeles, Wes Barker loses a tooth over an unpredictable trick, Simon Pierro monkeys around with a few banana<loving friends and much more.

programme.title: Blue Bloods S10 Ep03
programme.desc: Frank's esteem for an old friend and late socialite proves to be a mistake when her son threatens to publicly reveal who she really was.

programme.title: The Blacklist S9 Ep03
programme.desc: Following the death of Elizabeth Keen, Raymond Reddington and the members of the FBI Task Force have disbanded - their lives now changed in unexpected ways and with Reddington's whereabouts unknown.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior S11 Ep26
programme.desc: The season's top competitors attempt to conquer all four stages of the Finals course, beginning with Stage 1, which features eight obstacles, including the new Roulette Row and Diving Boards.

programme.title: SupermodelMe Revolution Ep05
programme.desc: The 8 models step in the boxing ring in a belle brawl, and step on stage to star in a legendary street theater. Tempers hit below the belt and egos steal the show, and one model exits the spotlight.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex S2 Ep02
programme.desc: The clock is ticking as Charlie and Rex attempt to find a murderer before their victim can succumb to the poison slowly killing them.

programme.title: The Rookie S4 Ep06
programme.desc: Nolan starts his first year as an official patrol officer, while a new rookie with a complicated past joins the station. He will be taking on more dangerous cases while navigating a new relationship.

programme.title: Csi: Crime Scene Investigation S13 Ep21
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the death of a ghost hunter, on CSI: CRIME SCENE INVESTIGATION.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: Go on a quest with the Monkey King, Goddess of Mercy and Dragon Girl, as they battle Hung, the son of the Ox Demon to save Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim.

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: A woman gets involved in a Ching Dynasty salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and dilemmas gone rotten.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Ti Lung plays a helpless man who is under the spell of an evil witch doctor in this bone-chilling tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: This epic classic charts a romance between two teenage cousins, who pursue their relationship despite objections from their respective families.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Wang Yu heads this film's stellar cast under martial arts master, Chang Cheh. Together, they present beautifully choreographed action scenes.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: Seven seductive Spiders lie in wait for our faithful heroes in the third installment of the Shaw Brothers adaptation of Journey to the West.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: After enduring several trials (including his girlfriend's rape), a man (Chen Wo-Fu) puts his tai chi skills to deadly use.

programme.title: Return of the Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Ti Lung returns as Li Chin Huan, the renowned swordsman who must face the Chief of the Money Clan and his legion of assassins for the fate of the 'Martial Arts World'.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: In Shaw Brothers' showcase for the talented Ling Yun, a young drummer hungry for fame sacrifices everything including love, for his art. Will the prize prove worth the cost?

programme.title: Lady With a Sword
programme.desc: Director Kao Pao Shu casts Shaw's darling Lily Ho as the embittered swordswoman searching for the man who murdered her sister.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Serio-comic clashes of cultures ensue when a Mainland Chinese family try to make a go of it in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po and Chang Yi play a noble swordsman and a one-armed swordswoman who find themselves up against the evil Crimson Charm gang of thieves and thugs.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A ruthless gang goes up against a millionaire's daughter who has one of three priceless Golden Buddha statues.

programme.title: Facets of Love
programme.desc: In this king of epic dramas, three sexy vignettes are set against a Ming Dynasty brothel that steams with erotic myths, secret trysts and pleasurable twists.

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: In The Kung-fu Instructor, Ti Lung plays hero Huang Yang, a righteous weapon instructor whose main concern eventually becomes his survival.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Problems ensue after one of two childhood friends who have vowed to become sisters through the exchange of bracelets gets married.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: When villains 'Winged Tiger' Teng Fei and 'Underworld King' Yin Te Lung unite, the martial arts world is plunged into chaos. Can this deadly duo be stopped?

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: A pair of female martial artists end up banding together to go up against the evil Black Demon. Starring Cheng Pei Pei.

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: Flipping a coin' takes on a whole new meaning in this action-packed, martial arts melodrama - because the pocket change is actually deadly kung-fu weapons.

programme.title: Men From the Monastery
programme.desc: The story of Shaolin firebrands Fang Shih-yu, Hung I-kuan, and Hu Huei-chien comes to life in Chang Cheh's rousing kung fu saga.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: Families win and lose fortunes overnight while neighbours swindle each other as stock as speculation madness takes over Hong Kong.

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Watch as rival kung-fu schools try to sabotage Fei-hung's superior Pao Chih Lin clinic until the chivalrous philanthropist shows them the error of their ways.

programme.title: Love With the Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: Pauline Wong plays a pregnant student who marries a sympathetic, yet equally heartbroken, passer-by in Jamie Luk's directing debut.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Set in the Warring States period of ancient China, this drama tells the story of Nieh Cheng, one of history's greatest political assassins.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: This seminal film adaptation of a 17th century Pu Songling work is the precursor of the famed 'A Chinese Ghost Story'.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This abourer and complex adaptation of a popular wuxia novel contains conspiracies, stratagems, and sword fights aplenty.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: Michael Hui Kwun-Man makes a hilarious film debut as the nuttiest warlord of early 20th Century China! Also stars Lily Ho, Hu Chin and Tina Ti.

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: In this classic, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu take on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh, making this a 4-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: Xi Wen is getting married! Throwing her a wild bachelorette party in Vietnam are Xi Wen's best friends, Kimmy & the glamourous Jia Lan. Will it be the awesome night they imagine?

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: A series of comical events follow when a petty thief, a roguish security guard & a potty-mouthed woman find their lives intersecting one day over a lost gun & a heist.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: In this 6-time 2016 ICFF nominee, Liu Kai Chi won his first MTFF Golden Butterfly Best Actor award playing an intellectually-challenged father raising his child.

programme.title: Killer Limo
programme.desc: Full of sword fights and action-packed sequences, catch this exciting crime-action about a young woman who seeks revenge against criminal organizations who killed his father in Thailand.

programme.title: Summer Love Love
programme.desc: Three very different men from Hong Kong, who are desperately lonely, end up facing countless challenges when they decide to seek love in Hainan, China.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Vanguard, a covert private security, is tasked with protecting an accountant targeted by deadly mercenaries. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Zombiology: Enjoy Yourself Tonight
programme.desc: Two eccentric young men lead a reckless life - but when people start turning into zombies across the city, they take on the responsibility of braving the infected district to save others.

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: When three runaways shack up in an abandoned general store, a supernatural correspondence connects them to many lives that were all touched by the owner of the store, years before they were born.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: Produced by megastar Jay Chou, this drama starring Will Liu & Wang Jun Kai depicts how a former top team racing driver's focus on proving himself leads to his team's downfall.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: A violent shootout between the police and a group of gangsters 20 years ago sparks another bloodbath involving the surviving team members.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A tycoon's pregnant mistress flies to Seattle for the delivery of the baby. There, she meets another Chinese immigrant working as a driver, and unexpectedly falls in love with him.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: Helmed by four Best Actors and set in Hong Kong in the 1970s, this exciting action film charts how the ICAC dealt with corruption within the police force in its early stages of establishment.

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Eternal rivals Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are in a race to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the superstar midwife Gong San to "supervise" their sons and nephews to make it happen.

programme.title: Viral MH000991
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, this chilling Thai tale depicts how a gamer captures a spirit photo that she shares with friends - only to release the spirit that begins to haunt them all.

programme.title: So, I Married My Anti-fan
programme.desc: Starring Korean boy band EXO member Chanyeol & Chinese actress Yuan Shan Shan, this drama depicts how an anti-fan falls for the idol she initially hated.

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: When Dave, a cop, saves the life of a gang leader, he has no idea that the man will continue his violent reign. An attempt to stop them unleashes a demon.

programme.title: Cross
programme.desc: Starring Simon Yam, Nick Cheung & Liu Kai Chi, this disturbing tale depicts how a man, whose wife commits suicide, takes it upon himself to free people from their pain by killing them

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: The members of an internet suicide room decide to end their lives using explosives - but when every attempt somehow pushes them back in time, they suspect the issue to be their youngest member.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: 5-category nominee & winner in Best Editing & Best Original Screenplay at the 2016 GHA, this crime thriller is produced by Johnnie To & Yau Nai-hoi

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learned boxing since young & uses his skills to help the weak. When his friend is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: Helmed by four Best Actors and set in Hong Kong in the 1970s, this exciting action film charts how the ICAC dealt with corruption within the police force in its early stages of establishment.

programme.title: Love is...Pyjamas
programme.desc: As her boss struggles to save his sinking company, underwear designer Spring finds herself up against a new employee in a race to create a new fashion line.

programme.title: Dealer Healer
programme.desc: Sean Lau, Louis Koo, Gordon Lam & Zhang Jin star in this blockbuster biography of Chen Hua - a former underworld kingpin and drug dealer who finds a new lease of life.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: While using a new invention, three friends wind up trapped in the 1993 film Flirting Scholar. Upon discovering that the lead character, Tang Pak Fu, is missing, the trio devises a plan.

programme.title: Running Out of Time
programme.desc: A super thief, Andy who is dying, yet continues to plot his last jewel heist. In doing so, he arouses the suspicion of Sean, an inspector - but then, Sean learns the truth.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: A man blames himself for his mother's death, leading him to depression and panic disorder. Adapted from Steven Ma's true-life experience.

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Kara Hui makes her action film swansong by portraying a woman who will stop at nothing to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past resurface. Simon Yam & Wu Bai co-star.

programme.title: The World Today Ep279
programme.desc: Catch up live coverage, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage as The World Today keeps viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda Ep02
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Stephen Cole and his thought-provoking guests, this weekly talkshow looks beyond the headlines and 'accepted wisdom' in search of the real story.

programme.title: Africa Live Ep310
programme.desc: This program focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN's local correspondents and production teams provide in-depth stories from across the region.

programme.title: Talk Africa Ep43

At the height of the First World War, two young British soldiers must race against time to cross enemy territory and deliver a message that will stop a deadly attack.

programme.title: Jiu Jitsu
programme.desc: When celebrated war hero Jake Barnes is defeated by Brax, the indomitable leader of the invaders, the future of humanity hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: When a beautiful hybrid escapes from observation, scientist Xavier Fitch dispatches a crew of experts to find her before she mates and produces offspring.

programme.title: Like a Boss
programme.desc: Two female friends with very different ideals decide to start a beauty company together. One is more practical, while the other wants to earn her fortune and live a lavish lifestyle.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch grows increasingly annoyed with the ever-growing festive cheer that engulfs the village of Whoville. So, he teams up with his dog to ruin the festive spirit by being a spoilsport

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The (mis)adventures of Sonic as he navigates the complexities of life on Earth with his new human best friend. Together, they must stop Dr. Robotnik from using Sonic's immense powers for world domination.

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Drug dealer Zu finds herself becoming the sole guardian of her half-sister, Music, a young non-verbal autistic girl. Explores two of Sia's favourite themes - finding one's voice and creating family.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: A recently murdered Chicago cop works with Heaven's police force to track the man who killed him.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth

programme.title: Venom
